Class Question

java.lang.Object
models.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a quiz question with all its properties. This model class stores question data including text, options, correct answer and difficulty level.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question()
      Default constructor. Creates an empty Question object.

    • Question

      public Question(String questionText, String optionA, String optionB, String optionC, String optionD, String correctOption, String difficulty)
      Constructor with all question properties.
      Parameters:
      questionText - The text of the question
      optionA - Text for option A
      optionB - Text for option B
      optionC - Text for option C
      optionD - Text for option D
      correctOption - The correct option (A, B, C or D)
      difficulty - Difficulty level (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)
